name: WAHA - Get Chats
description: Retrieves a list of chats from the WAHA API. (Converted from Langflow Store for AxieStudio compatibility)

base_url.name: base_url
base_url.info: The base URL of the WAHA API.

code.value:
import httpx
from typing import List, Dict, Any
from pydantic import BaseModel, Field

from axiestudio.base.langchain_utilities.model import LCToolComponent
from axiestudio.inputs import MessageTextInput, IntInput
from axiestudio.schema import Data
from axiestudio.field_typing import Tool
from langchain.tools import StructuredTool

class WAHAGetChatsComponent(LCToolComponent):
    display_name = "WAHA - Get Chats"
    description = "Retrieves a list of chats from the WAHA API."
    icon = "message-circle-more"

    inputs = [
        MessageTextInput(
            name="base_url",
            display_name="Base URL",
            info="The base URL of the WAHA API.",
            value="http://localhost:3000",
        ),
        MessageTextInput(
            name="session",
            display_name="Session",
            info="The session name.",
            value="default",
        ),
        IntInput(
            name="limit",
            display_name="Limit",
            info="The maximum number of chats to retrieve.",
            value=100,
        ),
        IntInput(
            name="offset",
            display_name="Offset",
            info="The offset for pagination.",
            value=0,
        ),
    ]

    class WAHAGetChatsSchema(BaseModel):
        limit: int = Field(100, description="The maximum number of chats to retrieve.")
        offset: int = Field(0, description="The offset for pagination.")

    def run_model(self) -> List[Data]:
        chats = self._get_chats(self.limit, self.offset)
        return [Data(data=chat) for chat in chats]

    def build_tool(self) -> Tool:
        return StructuredTool.from_function(
            name="waha_get_chats",
            description="Retrieves a list of chats from the WAHA API.",
            func=self._get_chats,
            args_schema=self.WAHAGetChatsSchema,
        )

    def _get_chats(self, limit: int = 100, offset: int = 0) -> List[Dict[str, Any]]:
        url = f"{self.base_url}/api/{self.session}/chats"
        params = {
            "limit": limit,
            "offset": offset,
        }
        headers = {
            "X-Api-Key": "{{apiKey}}",  # Replace with actual API key handling
        }

        self.log(f"Sending GET request to {url}")
        with httpx.Client() as client:
            response = client.get(url, params=params, headers=headers)
        response.raise_for_status()
        chats = response.json()

        self.log(f"Retrieved {len(chats)} chats")
        return chats
code.name: code

limit.info: The maximum number of chats to retrieve.

from typing import List, Dict, Any
from pydantic import BaseModel, Field

from axiestudio.base.langchain_utilities.model import LCToolComponent

            value="default",
        ),
        IntInput(
            name="limit",
            display_name="Limit",
            info="The maximum number of chats to retrieve.",
            value=100,
        ),
